snippet: A Congress candidate who joined the opposition Bharatiya Janata Party did so after candidacy filing deadlines, so the party he abandoned cannot take him off the ticket and the party he joined cannot give him a fresh one.
abstract: A Congress candidate who joined the opposition Bharatiya Janata Party did so after candidacy filing deadlines, so the party he abandoned cannot take him off the ticket and the party he joined cannot give him a fresh one.

headline.main: Congress Member Defects, but Party Can't Get Rid of Him
